BadBehaviourRuntimeException - Exception in it.polimi.se2018.utils
The class BadBehaviourRuntimeException is a form of RuntimeException that is thrown when something that according the software logic should not happens and the recover from the situation is impossible.
BadBehaviourRuntimeException() - Constructor for exception it.polimi.se2018.utils.BadBehaviourRuntimeException
Basic constructor.
BadBehaviourRuntimeException(String) - Constructor for exception it.polimi.se2018.utils.BadBehaviourRuntimeException
Constructor with message.
BadFormattedPatternFileException - Exception in it.polimi.se2018.controller
The class BadFormattedPatternFileException is a form of Exception that is used to notify that an .xml file representing a pattern is bad formatted and due to this can't be correctly processed.
BadFormattedPatternFileException() - Constructor for exception it.polimi.se2018.controller.BadFormattedPatternFileException
 
BadFormattedToolCardFileException - Exception in it.polimi.se2018.controller
The class BadFormattedToolCardFileException is a form of Exception that is used to notify that an .xml file representing a toolcard is bad formatted and due to this can't be correctly processed.
BadFormattedToolCardFileException() - Constructor for exception it.polimi.se2018.controller.BadFormattedToolCardFileException
 
BorderPlacementRuleDecorator - Class in it.polimi.se2018.model
PlacementRule decorator to enforce the following rule: A dice can only be placed on an edge or corner space.
BorderPlacementRuleDecorator(PlacementRule) - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2018.model.BorderPlacementRuleDecorator
Class constructor specifying PlacementRule to be decorated.
